chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: What's the matter? You guys have come to the 11th video in the Sigma Web Development course.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: We have completed 10 videos.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, one like is for everyone's consistency.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In today's video, we will see about the Semantic Tax.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Because SEO is very important for the overall website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Search engines are very happy to see this structure.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That is, overall SEO will be very good for your website if you use these tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: What are the tax, why are there tax, how to use it, what is the benefit of this video.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So guys, first of all, I would like to tell you what happens.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Here you can see that I have made a folder in the name of video 11.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And here I have set an index.html boilerplate template.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I have set the title, H1 and set this image.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I am going to preview it here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, to explain this image a little, I will tell you what the Semantic Tax is.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Semantic Tags is the purpose of the website and web crawlers.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: They tell you what is the content of your website and what is the purpose of which place and which tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you do not use Semantic Tags in HTML, then your work will be done.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It is not that if you do not use Semantic Tags, then your website will not look good.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can do good designing.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But we want to explain to search engines like Google, Bing, about our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And if we explain them about our website, then they will be able to understand about our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And they will rank our website on Google, Bing, respective search engines.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And we want that the crawlers understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And we want that the website that we want to understand, can understand it well.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That is why there are some special tags like header, nav, main, article, figure.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: All these special tags are made in HTML which helps you to structure your website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now if there is anything in the header, then I know that it is header, that is at the top.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If there is anything in the footer, then I will understand that the website has started ending from here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This footer started here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But no, if I am using Semantic HTML, then I will use the footer tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Along with that, I was making my navigation bar in the span tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag this time.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So these are the differences that make our search engines understand well about our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I will show you some examples of Semantic Tags here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And I hope you understood what Semantic Tags are.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now look at the download folders of our computer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Some of you may have the download folder of the world.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: 90% of the files of your computer are downloaded by many people.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But we should not do that.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Some people go through this limit that they start sending files in their local disc, in windows folder.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And some people also keep files in system 32.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So if you send your files to your computer, then it will not be arranged in one way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But if you arrange it in folders, then it is your file.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you want to keep a secret file in a folder, then you can put it in a secret file.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you want to make a folder, then do not open it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you can put in some files in it, then it will be arranged in one way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you arrange images in one way, then you arrange videos in one way,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: and if you arrange from e-books, then you will get it whenever you go to search.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So to understand that, it will be better to send that folder structure instead of sending your files throughout the computer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You will definitely not want to send your files throughout the computer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I hope you understood why we use Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is very good for SEO.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I have not used that word yet.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But SEO, search engine optimization is a very important part of using Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So what happens?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Basically, the way you make your website, you use some special tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, let us say I am making this website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will comment out this image here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will not comment out this image.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will make a nav here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: First of all, I will say that this is the header of my website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will make a nav in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will make an unordered list in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will make an li in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will write home here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I am writing a lot of things in it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And this is my header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So anyone who will understand my website pack,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: will understand that this is my header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Home, about, contact, whatever I want to write,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I can write here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is my header, this is my nav bar.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is clearly known because I have used header and nav tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I write about here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I write contact here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I wrote home, about here and contact here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now if I want a footer,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I want to make a footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Here my main content will be header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I will use the main tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And then my footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will write in the footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Copyright, CWH.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And here I will write

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: All rights reserved.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I can write like this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So here, copyright

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: All rights reserved.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I have written all this here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I will do this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will cut this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will put the main camera.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So first my header will come,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then the main content will come, then the footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And here you can see, this is the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is my main content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I arranged it in one way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The way you arrange your files,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: in different folders.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I arranged my HTML tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So we understood about header tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It is used to represent the top section of a web page.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Which is the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Then we will put nav in navigation menu.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In our page, we will put it in nav tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Ideally.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Article indicates a self-containing piece of content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Such as blog post or news article.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you put a self-contained piece of content,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then you can put it in article tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Section represents a thematic grouping.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Suppose,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: one section of your page is talking about something.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The other section will talk about something else.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Aside.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If something is on one side, then we use aside tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Here you can see,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: typically used for sidebars and content that

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: is tangentially related to the main content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Like what can you do on aside tag?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You have to put a side note

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: about the author.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I have seen all the blogs in which it is written on the side about the author.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can put such things with aside tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Then we have footer tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I have told you about it.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Copyright information, if you want to put all this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Or if you want to put some important links

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: on the website, then you can put them in footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Then figure and pick caption.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: What is figure and pick caption?

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can use images, diagrams, charts,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: all these things.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can use figure and pick caption.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The main content in the main content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: like the main content of our page

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: was that we put it in the main tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Then time tag is also used to represent

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: time related information.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can use time tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can put date, time, anything.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I hope you have understood this.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, to enhance this SEO

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: we use this to enhance SEO.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: We use this to improve accessibility.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And if you want to take a decision

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: about a browser,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: let us say a browser has a new feature

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: called Nikala.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It will read our content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Like the feature on the edge.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, the browser can decide that

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I am reading the main content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Think about how to read the page.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Code with Harry, Home, Code Cis,

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You don't want to read the content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: or you want to read the main content.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, the main content is read.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: HTML, Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: HTML5 is introduced with

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: the range of Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The first versions of HTML

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: were not Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Semantic Tags were introduced

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: with HTML5.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And the most important reason

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: for introducing Semantic Tags

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: is to arrange things.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So that the content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: that is passing the content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: that is seeing the code of this content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: that is changing the code.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Or if you want to generate any preview

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: like you are using the URL on Twitter

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: if you want to generate a preview

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: of that type of things

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then you will want

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: to be able to understand your content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: properly.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, if you want to understand your content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: properly then you will use Semantic Tags.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Or this image is very good

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: that without Semantic Tags

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: if you write in HTML then

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: you will write in this way.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In this way, you have to throw something aside

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: and we will do it with CSS.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Don't get confused.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is not used for styling

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: because many people get confused

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: that is not the case.

chunks.text: You will have to style

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: the things that are there with CSS

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: but here

chunks.text: you can understand and describe

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: the main content

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: which is header or footer.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, Semantic Tags are made.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So, Semantic Tags are not made by any magic.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It is for accessibility

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: and to understand your page.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Here are some examples that you can see.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I have given the example of header

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: and footer tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can see that you will add

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: your navigation bar in the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And then you will style it with CSS.

chunks.text: I will show you a quick styling.
